data.lyric:
[ti:all the good girls go to hell]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]all the good girls go to hell - Billie Eilish
[00:03.17]Lyrics by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:06.34]Composed by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:09.51]My Lucifer is lonely
[00:16.18]Standing there killing time
[00:18.87]Can't commit to anything but a crime
[00:20.74]Peter's on vacation an open invitation
[00:26.62]Animals evidence
[00:29.28]Pearly Gates look more like a picket fence
[00:31.11]Once you get inside 'em
[00:33.51]Got friends but can't invite them
[00:36.61]Hills burn in California
[00:39.26]My turn to ignore ya
[00:41.87]Don't say I didn't warn ya
[00:46.91]All the good girls go to Hell
[00:51.01]'Cause even God herself has enemies
[00:56.50]And once the water starts to rise
[01:01.35]And Heaven's out of sight
[01:03.97]She'll want the Devil on her team
[01:11.75]My Lucifer is lonely
[01:18.60]Look at you needing me
[01:21.04]You know I'm not your friend without some greenery
[01:23.02]Walk in wearin' fetters
[01:25.67]Peter should know better
[01:28.90]Your cover up is caving in
[01:31.60]Man is such a fool why are we saving him
[01:33.45]Poisoning themselves now
[01:36.09]Begging for our help wow
[01:38.88]Hills burn in California
[01:41.53]My turn to ignore ya
[01:44.09]Don't say I didn't warn ya
[01:48.99]All the good girls go to Hell
[01:53.20]'Cause even God herself has enemies
[01:59.26]And once the water starts to rise
[02:03.65]And Heaven's out of sight
[02:06.26]She'll want the Devil on her team
[02:13.93]My Lucifer is lonely
[02:17.89]There's nothing left to save now
[02:24.41]My god is gonna owe me
[02:28.30]There's nothing left to save now
[02:43.98]I cannot do the snowflake
data.trans:
[ti:all the good girls go to hell]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:WHEN WE ALL FALL ASLEEP, WHERE DO WE GO?]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.17]//
[00:06.34]//
[00:09.51]Lucifer很孤独
[00:16.18]站在那里 消磨时间
[00:18.87]毫无疑问 我们都犯过错
[00:20.74]天庭没有了守护神 人人都可进来
[00:26.62]包括动物 显然
[00:29.28]天堂之门仿佛是社会阶层之间的屏障
[00:31.11]一旦你进去那里
[00:33.51]便要和朋友分离
[00:36.61]加州遭遇山火之灾
[00:39.26]我和你彻底划清界限
[00:41.87]别说我没警告过你
[00:46.91]好女孩最终都没有好下场
[00:51.01]就连上帝也有敌人
[00:56.50]一旦海平面开始上升
[01:01.35]天堂就会消逝不见
[01:03.97]这时上帝也需要恶魔的帮助
[01:11.75]Lucifer很孤独
[01:18.60]看起来你很需要我
[01:21.04]你知道 如果植被消失 我便不再是你的朋友
[01:23.02]戴着脚镣前行
[01:25.67]Peter应该知道
[01:28.90]你的伪装就要被识破
[01:31.60]人类如此愚蠢 我们为什么要救他
[01:33.45]他们自己作的孽
[01:36.09]如今却来向我们求助
[01:38.88]加州遭遇山火之灾
[01:41.53]我和你彻底划清界限
[01:44.09]别说我没警告过你
[01:48.99]好女孩最终都没有好下场
[01:53.20]就连上帝也有敌人
[01:59.26]一旦海平面开始上升
[02:03.65]天堂就会消逝不见
[02:06.26]这时上帝也需要恶魔的帮助
[02:13.93]Lucifer很孤独
[02:17.89]一切已无法挽回
[02:24.41]连上帝也会感激我的
[02:28.30]一切已无法挽回
[02:43.98]我不要做平凡的雪花
